title: Medical monitoring template to create a listing
description: This report displays a listing of the variables and data of interest, displayed in an interactive table. This table can contains comparison with a previous batch ('comparisonTable' parameters).

templatePackage.doc: package from which the template should be extracted

dataFileName.doc: name of the data file of interest

dataTotalProcessing.doc: data processing parameters for 'dataTotalFileName', passed to \link[medicalMonitoring]{processData}

tableParams.doc: parameters to create the table, passed to \link[medicalMonitoring]{tableMonitoring}

comparisonTableType.doc: output type of the comparison table

comparisonTableParams.doc: parameters for the comparison table, passed to \link[glpgUtilityFct]{compareTables}
